reviewText:
Despite what the Amazon webpage indicates, this flick isn't rated X. It's just Veronika dancing and posing, except for the first video of her with 3 other chicks rubbing each other, and the last in which she's with one other chick playing some sort of truth-or-dare type talking game with the interviewer. That's the only one you get to hear her Czech voice.

I'm ambivalent about this. Disappointed I don't get to see some action with her, and happy that she's a good girl who never does that sort of thing on camera.

If you like Veronika Zemanova this disc is for you.  It has several scenes of her alone, one with another woman and one with three women.  One scene is not watchable but it is short.  The rest of the scenes are in pretty good shape.

Where to begin! This is a compilation of many videos, none of which disappoint, and this one ends with an informative nude interview. Veronika Zemanova definitely gives good face, but she undoubtedly has one of the greatest bodies of any woman ever to walk the Earth. Her own website provides a full archive of all her erotic photography. She looks good at every angle, period. From the Czech Republic, she reminds us why European women continue to set a standard for grace and beauty that is innately unattainable to other regions around the world. The 'Danni's Angels' segment is unforgettable. Why Zemanova hasn't been cast as a Bond girl is sad now that the Daniel Craig Bond films have moved away from sexy spies. Their loss, so buy this video; you won't regret it.

There are several videos of Veronika on this DVD that just make you open up your mouth wide and moan out loud "Oh my god, yesssss!"

One of the videos is Veronika dressed as Wonder Woman, and it is one of the hottest things I have ever seen.  What else can I say; after a few minutes of watching Veronika Zemanova prance around in that skin tight Wonder Woman outfit, slowly peel it off, and then apply lotion to her body, I was quite happy.

Veronika Zemanova has the most perfect body of any woman on this planet.  All her curves are in just the right places.

If you're a Veronika fan, you better buy this DVD while you can.  You will not be disappointed.
